languages.text: "Используем тактику тотального уничтожения. Сносите все священные цеха и капеллы, где может укрыться враг".
"What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
languages.original_text: "Используем тактику тотального уничтожения. Сносите все священные цеха и капеллы, где может укрыться враг".

traits.locale_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
"What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
"What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
"What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
"What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
"What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."

languages.text: “我们要彻底歼灭敌人。我们准备夷平所有神圣设施与教堂，让敌人无处藏身。”
languages.original_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."

traits.locale_text: “我们要彻底歼灭敌人。我们准备夷平所有神圣设施与教堂，让敌人无处藏身。”

languages.text: « Une annihilation totale est nécessaire. Rasez chaque bâtiment sacré et chapelle où l'ennemi pourrait se cacher. »
languages.original_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."

traits.locale_text: « Une annihilation totale est nécessaire. Rasez chaque bâtiment sacré et chapelle où l'ennemi pourrait se cacher. »

languages.text: 「我々に必要なのは完全なる殲滅だ。敵が隠れみのにできるような神聖な施設や礼拝堂はすべて壊滅させたほうがいい」
languages.original_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."

traits.locale_text: 「我々に必要なのは完全なる殲滅だ。敵が隠れみのにできるような神聖な施設や礼拝堂はすべて壊滅させたほうがいい」

languages.text: «Nuestra prioridad es la aniquilación total. Aniquilar todos los enclaves sagrados y las capillas que nuestros enemigos puedan usar de cobertura».
languages.original_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra prioridad es la aniquilación total. Aniquilar todos los enclaves sagrados y las capillas que nuestros enemigos puedan usar de cobertura».

languages.text: "Was wir benötigen, ist die völlige Auslöschung. Wir müssen jede heilige Stätte und Kapelle dem Erdboden gleichmachen, die unsere Feinde als Deckung nutzen könnten."
languages.original_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."

traits.locale_text: "Was wir benötigen, ist die völlige Auslöschung. Wir müssen jede heilige Stätte und Kapelle dem Erdboden gleichmachen, die unsere Feinde als Deckung nutzen könnten."

languages.text: "İhtiyacımız olan şey, topyekûn imha. Düşmanlarımızın siper olarak kullanabileceği her bir tesisi ve şapeli yerle yeksan etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "What we require is total annihilation. Raze every sacred facility and chapel that our enemies could use as cover."
